m_szDocTitle: Audi Electric SUV With 300 Miles of Range Slated For 2018 or 2019 | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Audi Electric SUV With 300 Miles of Range Slated For 2018 or 2019 Originally published on EV Obsession . The oft-rumored Audi electric SUV coupe — presumed to be the “Q6” — just became a lot more concrete, following comments made by Audi CEO Rupert Stadler. The Audi head noted that the electric SUV coupe would be arriving sometime in 2018/2019, that it would feature a range of at least 500 kilometers per charge (~310 miles), and that it would be “sexy and sporty” — during an interview with the UK’s Auto Express . (Presumably, it’ll only be sexy and sporty, not scary, or posh, or baby.) Worth n
